definitions: the fact of being advertised or publicized in a particular way

examples.text: they can justify their billing as the American League favorites
he shared top billing with his wife

shortDefinitions: fact of being advertised or described in particular way

definitions: the process of making out or sending invoices

examples.text: faster, more accurate order fulfillment and billing

shortDefinitions: process of preparing or sending invoices

definitions: the total amount of business conducted in a given time, especially that of an advertising agency

examples.text: the account was worth about $2 million a year in billings

shortDefinitions: total amount of business conducted in given time
